message: Hey All! Me and a few friends (Alec McElhinny and Axl Harlander) are trying to find a sub-leasers for our apartment this summer. It's a 2 bedroom double occupancy apartment in DinkyTown at the Marshall and you'll be living with the amazing Erik Johnson as well. We are setting the rent at $400 per month. So please feel free to contact us if interested or if you want to negotiate the price.
